29000054.<voice 00001_29000054><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00001_29000054><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>This is... Melsandy Village. I remember it...
It's just like the Melsandy Village I used to live
in, and yet...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000055.<voice 00002_29000055><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00002_29000055><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I don't recognize anybody. Like Raska, Uncle Gash,
or Grandma Kope...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000056.<voice 00003_29000056><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00003_29000056><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Those people really never existed though, right.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000057.<voice 00004_29000057><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00004_29000057><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Hmph... Okay, let's start investigating the village.
You think the Pendulum of Fate will show us the way?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000228.<voice 00000_29000228><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00000_29000228><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...I have an unpleasant hunch.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000231.<voice 00001_29000231><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00001_29000231><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That the village where I lived as Mishua and 'The
Tale Of Little Hero Zankrone' are clearly somehow
connected.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000240.<voice 00002_29000240><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00002_29000240><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>That much we can agree on... Yes.<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000241.<voice 00003_29000241><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00003_29000241><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If the following story is as sad as she said then...
Perhaps something bad will happen to False Melsandy
Village...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000242.<voice 00004_29000242><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00004_29000242><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Even if what you said was true, isn't the fake just
a piece of junk the Great Demon King made?<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000825.<voice 00005_29000825><start_lip_sync c0:
<voice 00005_29000825><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Even if... Even if it's not likely that it comes
from it. If there's any connection to the True
World....<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000826.<voice 00006_29000826><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00006_29000826><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>...Umm, as usual, I can't see properly, but this Pendulum of Fate might guide us.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000827.<voice 00007_29000827><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00007_29000827><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, if it's a picture-show story, won't the
village kids know all about it?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000828.<voice 00008_29000828><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00008_29000828><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You're right. Let's try to look a little bit longer
for details.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000058.<voice 00000_29000058><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00000_29000058><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...I've done nothing. I'm the Hero and yet, I haven't saved neither True nor False Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000059.<voice 00001_29000059><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00001_29000059><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If nothing else, I want to give Aili hope.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000060.<voice 00002_29000060><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00002_29000060><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Please, everyone, lend me your power. So that I can get used to being the Hero.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
